title: Yeenoghu's lair (SLASH'EM)
data:
In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [Yeenoghu](/wiki/Yeenoghu "Yeenoghu")'s lair is located between levels 2 and 5 of Gehennom. It is surrounded by a standard Gehennom maze level.

## Level

 -------------------------------------------------  
 | ---------|  |----------|                         
 | |....[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")...|--|......|...------------              
 | |....|...|  |......-...[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")..........|             
 | |....|-------..........|...------[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")-------        
 ---....|--|..............|...|............|----    
 ..........[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")..............|---|.....[\\](/wiki/Throne "Throne")......[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door").[>](/wiki/Staircase "Staircase").|    
 ---....|--|..............|...|............|----    
 | |....|-------..........|...--------------        
 | |....|...|  |......-...[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")..........|              
 | |....[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")...|--|......|...------------              
 | ---------|  |----------|                         
 -------------------------------------------------

[Yeenoghu](/wiki/Yeenoghu "Yeenoghu") is on the throne. The level also contains eight ghouls, six [ghasts](/wiki/Ghast "Ghast"), seventeen gnolls, two random pieces of armor, two random weapons, a random gem, two random potions, three random scrolls, two fire traps, and four magic traps.

## See also

- [Special level (SLASH'EM)](/wiki/Special_level_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Special level (SLASH'EM)")

## Reference

From gehennom.des source file.

Yeenoghu's lair (SLASH'EM)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

In SLASH'EM, Yeenoghu's lair is located between levels 2 and 5 of Gehennom. It is surrounded by a standard Gehennom maze level.

Level

 -------------------------------------------------
 | ---------|  |----------|                       
 | |....S...|--|......|...------------            
 | |....|...|  |......-...S..........|           
 | |....|-------..........|...------S-------      
 ---....|--|..............|...|............|----  
 ..........S..............|---|.....\......S.>.|  
 ---....|--|..............|...|............|----  
 | |....|-------..........|...--------------      
 | |....|...|  |......-...S..........|            
 | |....S...|--|......|...------------            
 | ---------|  |----------|                       
 -------------------------------------------------

Yeenoghu is on the throne. The level also contains eight ghouls, six ghasts, seventeen gnolls, two random pieces of armor, two random weapons, a random gem, two random potions, three random scrolls, two fire traps, and four magic traps.

See also

  • Special level (SLASH'EM)

Reference

From gehennom.des source file.
